ygData.subject: Re: Tongues, blue cons, and etiquette
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks, I d like to see that /con guide. Hide/Sneak - (I m also answering the post after this one from subemc) -- I know about the /con-indifferent
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks, I'd like to see that /con
guide.<br><br>Hide/Sneak - (I'm also answering the post after this one
from subemc) -- I know about the /con-indifferent
thing; that's worked for me in Freeport, although I
think you have to be behind the MOB/merchant. Then
they'll sell to you. I tried it while Hidine/Sneaking in
front of them, and they still regarded me
apprehensively or dubiously, and wouldn't sell.<br><br>But the
thing about the Orcs is that I walked right past two of
them without them seeing me. After the stomped me, I
went back and looked at the events, and there was no
"Auto-Attack On," so I don't think I hit that by mistake. It
just seems that suddenly they could see me for some
reason, so I wondered if it was the Oracle. I had no time
to hit /con -- I was about 5 feet away.<br><br>I'm a
gutsy little guy sometimes.<br><br>Kharlisht
